titleStmt.title: To SIR JONATHAN FREDERICK POLLOCKSir (Jonathan) Frederick Pollock (1783-1870; Dictionary of National Biography), Chief Baron of the Exchequer 1844-66. Knighted 1834; Bart 1866. AND LADY POLLOCK,Sir Frederick’s second wife, Sarah Anne Amowah (née Langslow); married 1834; she died 1895. 5 DECEMBER 1845

dateline.date: Fifth December 1845.Address and date at bottom of letter.

body.p: Mr. Charles Dickens has great pleasure in accepting the kind Invitation of the Lord Chief Baron and Lady Pollock for Wednesday the Seventeenth.The invitation was to dinner (To Stone, 17 Dec, Pilgrim Letters 4, p.451).
